National Sunglasses Day

National Sunglasses Day is June 27th, a day of celebration and a reminder of the importance of wearing ultraviolet (UV) protective eyewear. Wearing shades are a healthy necessity as Ultraviolet (UVA/UVB) eye exposure can lead to vision loss, yet more than 25% do not wear shades when outside.

Brands such as Carrera,Givenchy, Dolce & Gabbana, Fendi, Prada, Versace, Tiffany & Co. and many more luxury styles offering 100% Ultraviolet protection for Women, Men and Kids. Ultraviolet damage occurs over a lifetime of exposure so it is important to make sunglasses an “outdoor habit”, regardless of the season. UV Protection is especially important for children as young eyes are very susceptible to UV damage, receiving almost 3x the annual adult dose.

Solstice Sunglasses is currently offering a 40% discount off select UVA/UVB protective sunglasses* with Free 2-Day Shipping. Solstice Sunglasses is running National Sunglasses Days June 27th through June 30th and we are offering a Free Gift With every Purchase. You can also find the Solstice store near you and get your shady style in full gear!

Celebrate National Sunglasses Days, celebrate sunnies and share the UV protection message with Solstice Sunglasses and take advantage of our discount and Free Gift with Purchase on June 27th through June 30th. Wear your new designer sunglasses around town and like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter or tag our Instagram account for others to see you wearing your sunnies from Solstice Sunglasses. Show off your shades and protect your eyes!

*=Online Exclusions: Balenciaga, Bottega Veneta, Celine, Christian Dior, Dior Homme, Dita, Gucci, Maui Jim, Oakley, Oliver Peoples, Quay, Ray-Ban, Saint Laurent, Thom Browne, Tom Ford and Sale.
